static_items.name: message_3
static_items.message: This is a static items message. It should change the state to message state, show the message box and allow the player to step through the message content. Once the message is finished the last input should reset the game state to playing.

static_items.name: statue_1
static_items.message: A massive statue of an ancient dragon.
